_header: It is folly a man a thing to begin
_description: Proverbial couplet about the folly of attempting what one has not intelligence to do — one couplet

GULHun230.Transcription:
Yt ys ffolly a man a thyng to begynWyche to perform his wittes be
                    butt theyn
GULHun230.Note:
One of a series of proverbial couplets, added to end flyleaf by hand of
                    the sixteenth century.
